description:
As leaders in employment and personal injury law cases, our team at Gomez Law works with clients in Buffalo, New York, and the surrounding areas. Our law firm handles matters on both the plaintiff and defense sides that include topics such as the following:

  • Sexual harassment and discrimination
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents and workers' compensation
  • Medical and dental malpractice

Our law firm features highly experienced litigators who have had success in a number of courtrooms. We are in constant pursuit of what is best for our clients. As such, we stay on top of emerging trends and tactics that lead to victories. We hold honors that include an Avvo "Superb" rating and being selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers.

One of the main things we are known for is our personalization. There is no such thing as a one-size-fits-all solution. We customize every strategy we develop for our clients. Additionally, we do everything we can to accommodate them as their case unfolds. Gomez Law offers free initial consultations, as well as virtual appointments. We also accept credit cards in order to accommodate clients of our law firm. Someone on our team is available around the clock to respond to clients' concerns.
